text: Johannes van Knobelsdorff (19 September 1917 - 2 April 2020) was a Dutch politician. He was born in The Hague. He was mayor of Goedereede and Stellendam from 1947 to 1961. He was also Mayor of Sassenheim from 1961 to 1974. He was also Dijkgraaf. Knobelsdorff died on 2 April 2020 at the age of 102. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Dutch centenarians Category:Dutch mayors Category:Dutch nobility Category:Politicians from The Hague
title: Johannes van Knobelsdorff
